article.headline: Pence, Harris square off in vice-presidential debate: live blog
article.body: Mike Pence and Kamala Harris are facing off in their sole vice-presidential debate of campaign 2020, and MarketWatch reporters will live-blog the action. The debate between Vice President Pence and Sen. Harris will begin at 9 p.m. Eastern and last for and hour and a half, without commercials. It’s being held in Salt Lake City, at the University of Utah. As MarketWatch has reported, President Donald Trump’s COVID-19 diagnosis and his handling of the pandemic are set to feature prominently in the debate. The two contenders will also likely spar over the economy, on a day when stocks DJIA, +0.56% rose more than 500 points. Key tickers: S&P 500 SPX, +0.87% U.S. dollar DXY, -0.58% 10-year Treasury TMUBMUSD10Y, 0.777%.
